title: Opeth Discography: (10 Albums)[320 kbps]
description:
So there arent many uploads of albums from this great band in (high quality) mp3, so here is the whole discography converted from various FLAC uploads on the internet in full 320 kbps mp3 quality.

Included Albums:

2. Under the Weeping Moon
3. Silhouette
4. Forest of October
5. The Twilight is My Robe
6. Requiem
7. The Apostle in Triumph
8. Into the Frost of Winter

Opeth is a great band, so enjoy the music and please seed so others can continue to enjoy it after you!
